esef-14233_2021.value: PAO NOVATEK (hereinafter referred to as “NOVATEK” or the “Company”) and its subsidiaries (hereinafter jointly  referred to as the “Group”) is an independent oil and gas company engaged in the acquisition, exploration, development,  production, processing, and marketing of hydrocarbons with its oil and gas operations located mainly in the Yamal-  Nenets Autonomous District (hereinafter referred to as “YNAO”) of the Russian Federation. The Group delivers its  natural gas and its liquid hydrocarbons on both the Russian domestic and international markets.

esef-14231_2021.value: Ulitsa Pobedy 22a  629850 Tarko-Sale  Yamal-Nenets Autonomous District  Russian Federation
